DOC.detailed_description: The MTS study fund five year K23 NIH train grant . The study follow randomize controlled design N = 240 . Both study group control group enrol Wisconsin Tobacco Quit Line , receive four week nicotine patch , receive phone base counsel Quit Line . The control group n = 120 receive Quit Line intervention alone study group n = 120 receive Quit Line intervention plus Mindfulness Training Smokers ( MTS ) Intervention . Mindfulness Training Smokers provide 4 week mindfulness meditation instruction follow entry MTS meditation group . The total time study include recruitment , intervention participant follow-up N = 240 four year . The study recruit subject Dane county region University Wisconsin School Medicine Public Health Center Tobacco Research Intervention ( UW-CRTI ) . Recruitment take place television radio advertisement ( appendix ) . In addition , Wisconsin Quit Line web site provide link MTS study . With link , quit line coach brief description study ( see appendix ) provide contact information study . Finally , MTS web site ( url : www.sittoquit.org ) provide basic introductory information available general public . The principal hypothesis study MTS plus Quit Line lead significantly high rate smoke cessation 6 month use Quit Line alone . Secondary hypothesis study group compare control show significant difference questionnaire result test distress , depression , anxiety , attentional control , mindfulness quality life .
